articles.content:
Adam Lambert, Wayne Brady, and Tituss Burgess will all play key roles
Ratatouille: The TikTok Musical has some big Broadway talent on board for its January 1st streaming performance. Adam Lambert, W… [+1404 chars]

articles.description: Following the singer-guitarist's death on Christmas Day, those who shared the stage with Rice recall bluegrass's "true innovator"
